amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the Energy Information Administration and zero out the $122 million provided in the bill for the EIA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for the Energy Information Administration. The amendment also reduces funds for Department of Energy-Energy Programs-Energy Information Administration to $0.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A046) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A046) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Byrne.
